channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault on SoftLayer API

item.title: changePassword
item.description: REST Example curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [string, string, string]}' \ 'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Backup_Evault/changePassword'

item.title: collectBandwidth

item.title: enableSnapshots

item.title: getGraph

item.title: getHardwareWithEvaultFirst
